title: Wheat and cotton prices graph - effect

content.question: The chart above supports which of the following conclusions regarding economic conditions in the United States during the last third of the nineteenth century?

choices.label: Americans with relatively stable incomes found it increasingly difficult to make ends meet.
Cheap foreign goods were the primary cause for the decline in prices.
Industrial workers refused to demand higher wages due to declining prices.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
